name: DocumentArtboardLayout
shortdesc: The layout of artboards in document.

property.name: GridByRow
property.shortdesc: Arrange artboards in Grid by Row pattern.

property.name: GridByCol
property.shortdesc: Arrange artboards in Grid by Column pattern.

property.name: Row
property.shortdesc: Arrange artboards in a single row.

property.name: Column
property.shortdesc: Arrange artboards in a single column.

property.name: RLGridByRow
property.shortdesc: Arrange artboards in Grid by Row pattern from right-to-left.

property.name: RLGridByCol
property.shortdesc: Arrange artboards in Grid by Column pattern from right-to-left.

property.name: RLRow
property.shortdesc: Arrange artboards in a single row from right-to-left.
